metadata.Title: CVE-2021-37959 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: Use after free in Task Manager in Google Chrome prior to 94.0.4606.54allowed an attacker who convinced a user to enage in a series of usergestures to potentially exploit heap corruption via a crafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
